programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E27 Unlucky Strikes
programme.desc: Witnesses of a car burglary assist an officer in locating the suspect. An officer investigates a fight involving a young man and a homeless gentleman. A suspect’s testimony is debunked after an eyewitness confirms that his knife wounds were self-inflicted.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E11 Candlelight Burglar
programme.desc: Deputies respond to a fight between a daughter’s boyfriend and her mother. A woman lights candles after an attempted break-in. Police respond when an evicted tenant tries to reenter his old apartment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E15 Bumper Cars
programme.desc: A man rams his wife’s car into his daughter’s car. Deputies find a rifle in a suspect’s car that was in a prior altercation. A man claims to run a travel business after deputies find evidence of id theft.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E12 Safe Cracking
programme.desc: A man stages a sit-in in his car in an attempt to stop it from being towed. A homeowner denies that he’s selling drugs despite the large amount of evidence found in his home. A safe full of evidence is found during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E12 ID Please
programme.desc: Officers pursue a man who attempted to cash a bad check then fled the scene. Police are called when a man’s ex-girlfriend breaks into his house. Police chase an unlicensed teen speeding in a vehicle

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E06 Foul Prowl
programme.desc: Officers respond after a bloody man is seen prowling around an apartment complex. Officers pull over a suspicious vehicle. Police seize drugs and a large knife from a bicyclist.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E17 Doggie Paddle
programme.desc: The boat unit contends with an unruly suspect and his equally unpredictable dogs. Two burglary suspects try to claim car trouble when they're found at the scene of the crime. A repentant meth addict is caught by officers on the brink of his latest relapse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E03 Dangerous Toppings
programme.desc: A jaywalker with no ID bolts away from an officer. A man mixes illicit items with his pizza. A woman involved in a domestic violence call blames her monthly issues.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E36 Extreme COPS
programme.desc: Several squad cars join together in pursuit of a pickup truck. Officers conduct a drug raid utilizing percussion grenades. A suspect wanted for numerous robberies flees from Police in a sports car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E11 Taser Proof
programme.desc: Officers learn the hard way that even a taser can’t take some suspects down. Patrol cars roll up on a couple in a darkened pickup truck. Cops arrest one of the most polite suspects in America.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E11 First Do No Harm
programme.desc: A suicidal man tries to taunt police into shooting him. Undercover officers expose an illegal operation at a pain management clinic. A woman claims she’s just a bystander to a motorcycle hit and run.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E31 Wake Up Jamie
programme.desc: Officers arrest a female driver for drug possession and whose mother scolds her before she’s carted off to jail. An officer arrests a man who alleges that he’s waiting for his date for outstanding warrants and a stolen vehicle. An officer takes a known prostitute to jail.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E24 Kick the Car
programme.desc: Officers intervene when an estranged husband kicks his ex-wife’s boyfriend’s car. A man claims someone gave him the car he is driving. A woman claims the pills in her purse are not hers.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E13 Sledgehammer
programme.desc: Officers assist a bondsman after a fugitive and his girlfriend refuse to surrender. An officer pulls over a teen who attempts to ingest a bag of marijuana while the officer isn’t looking. An officer makes an arrest after the female suspect has an outstanding warrant.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E18 Special Delivery
programme.desc: Deputies prevent the delivery of a pillow stuffed with drugs. A disabled woman calls the law when a father and son get into a fist fight. Deputies confront an intoxicated man riding a bike.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E22 That’s Not Nice
programme.desc: Officers spot a suspected stolen vehicle and a pursuit ensues. Officers are called to a fight at a bar over a tossed drink. Police are called to the scene of two intoxicated siblings arguing.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E27 Truck Trunks
programme.desc: A foot pursuit ends in arrest after a suspected drug dealer attempts to discard his goods. Police are called to a warehouse after the security guard is held at gunpoint. Police assist a young girl after being struck by a car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E23 Traveling Fast
programme.desc: Officers pursue a vehicle traveling up to 100mph. An officer is dispatched to a larceny in progress at a convenience store. Dispatch informs officers that a man threatened an elderly woman.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E26 Walk the Line
programme.desc: A DUI suspect with a suspended license claims he’s not drunk. Officers track an armed robber. An armed and dangerous suspect hides from Officers in an apartment complex.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E22 And Through the Woods
programme.desc: Officers chase a fleeing suspect as he runs through the woods and into a rose bush. An elderly man puts himself in the middle of a knife fight. Two brothers disagree over letting officers search their car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E30 It's Laundry Day
programme.desc: Deputies detain a man when a gun falls from his pantleg. Deputies are called when a father spits on his son’s girlfriend. Officers respond when a child is bitten by two large dogs.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E23 Behind Blue Eyes
programme.desc: An officer assists a routine traffic stop which results in a DUI arrest. A drug related arrest is made in a high crime area. A man with a revoked driver’s license is placed under arrest and a prostitute is let go with a warning.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E18 Spiked but Still Moving
programme.desc: A suspect refuses to stop his vehicle even after the officers spike his tires. A dispute over money results in a pregnant woman being attacked. A woman asks for officers to help her rescue cats from a trailer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E02 Hood Flip
programme.desc: A police chase becomes more dangerous when the hood of a stolen vehicle flips open. A purse snatcher denies robbing a woman. A limping man with a knee injury denies crashing his car into a tree.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E17 Family Therapy
programme.desc: Officers are flagged down and alerted to a group of armed men assaulting people at a nearby home. A fight between a father and his adult son takes a dark turn. A father threatens his daughter and her boyfriend with a knife.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E15 Mamma's House
programme.desc: Deputies search for a man who ran from a traffic stop. A man being pursued tells officers he was going to his mother’s house. A drunk driver won’t admit to hitting a car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E11 Spoonful of Trouble
programme.desc: When a driver fails to stop, a freeway pursuit ensues. Officers investigate a suspicious car parked in a commercial parking lot. Officers respond to a shoplifting call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E07 No Shirt, Lots of Service
programme.desc: When approached by police, a suspect decides to take his shirt off and taunt the officers. Twin sisters ask for help when their third sister is threated by her boyfriend. An intoxicated suspect crashes his wife’s car into a light pole.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E19 Memory Loss
programme.desc: A man on parole dumps a stolen car and flees from officers on foot. A man denies stealing a wallet from a car with a smashed window. A hostile woman gives officers a false name.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E36 Pumping Iron
programme.desc: Teens are arrested after authorities find an open container and drugs inside a vehicle. A suspect is arrested after fleeing the police. Officers respond to a fight involving two men and a shovel.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E06 Tazed and Confused
programme.desc: Cops are forced to take desperate measures when an unruly suspect won’t stop fighting. Officers have to contain a man looking to flee with crack. Police know a tearful driver has weed in the car when he refuses to open his glove box.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E05 Put Your Clothes Back On
programme.desc: Cops try desperately to get an unclothed man to cooperate. After a chase with a pickup truck, officers find a 14-year-old in the driver’s seat. On a routine traffic stop, police contend with a plethora of dope and even more lies.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E01 Young and the Restless
programme.desc: Officers arrest a man suspected of robbery. A riot erupts at a juvenile party on the beach. Officers find an intoxicated man stuck on an iron fence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E20 A Mother's Love
programme.desc: Officers are forced to use a taser to subdue a drunk driver. A man is arrested for soliciting prostitution. Officers respond to a complex domestic disturbance call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E33 A Man's Pride
programme.desc: An officer assists with a burglary call at a mall jeweler. An officer responds to a domestic dispute call involving two newlyweds at a Las Vegas motel. An accident occurs during a routine traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E16 Two-Wheeling Away
programme.desc: Officers are dispatched to an apartment complex where a young girl may have been a victim of a sexual assault. An officer spots a speeding motorcycle and attempts a routine stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E32 Anger Management
programme.desc: An out-of-control woman needs to be subdued after an arrest. Deputies spot an erratic driver who appears to be under the influence. A car is seen driving backwards on a one-way street.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E33 Loiter with intent
programme.desc: Officers investigate an apparent stabbing. Officers respond to a call about a suspicious man loitering in a private park. A driver insists his vehicle is not stolen even though the plates are.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E14 High Speed Golf
programme.desc: Deputies pursue a truck with a trailer full of golf carts. Police question a driver after finding a mask and handgun in his car. Officers are called to a traffic collision involving a semi and an SUV.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E33 Motojam
programme.desc: A K-9 unit finds the suspect hiding in a shed. A cooperative suspect is faced with a list of charges. A motorcycle chase comes to an end after the suspect ditches the stolen bike and flees on foot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E26 Pitted Against Each Other
programme.desc: A chase ends after one of the police units disables the vehicle. An officer responds to a domestic dispute between a mother and her son. Officers attempt to pull over a vehicle with expired tags.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E03 Shovel Trouble
programme.desc: Officers conduct a sting using a decoy vehicle. A man with a knife flees the scene of a dispute with his baby mama. Deputies are dispatched when a man is assaulted with a shovel over twenty dollars.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E17 Facebook Fury
programme.desc: A DUI suspect reminds an officer of one famous dude. A naked man shocks a stranger on her porch. A daughter’s tantrum shakes the whole apartment when mom takes away Facebook.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E30 Follow the Tire Tracks
programme.desc: A decoy vehicle is strategically abandoned in a public parking lot. An officer responds to a burglary in progress at a tire store. Officers respond to a domestic call at a nearby trailer park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E01 Coco the Clown
programme.desc: An officer shows up as Coco the Clown in an undercover sting. The Vice unit conducts a reverse-prostitution sting designed to capture suspected “johns.”

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E07 Chainsaw Man
programme.desc: Detectives find a loaded gun while searching a vehicle. Local residents complain about a loud neighbor. A man is spotted walking down a road with a saw.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E16 We Run the Show
programme.desc: A stealthy robbery suspect leads officers on a chase through backyards. After dropping a bag of meth, a man swears he’s only seen the drug on TV. A doped-up domestic violence suspect tries to claim self-defense.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S25 : E16 Garden of Crime
programme.desc: Deputies question a woman they believe to be a prostitute working the Las Vegas Strip. A woman tries to pin ownership of drug paraphernalia on an absent friend. A man consents to let officers in his backyard, but he confesses to his own trespasses first.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E13 High Jump Fail
programme.desc: A family with kids is taken on a high speed car chase. A intoxicated suspect tries to jump a fence while protesting that he’s not trying to run away. A jealous boyfriend terrorizes his girlfriend and her parents.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E15 Graveyard Shiftiness
programme.desc: Officers detect a strong odor of marijuana during a routine traffic stop. A woman tells Officers her inebriated boyfriend smashed a window. Police investigate a suspicious vehicle parked behind a cemetery.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E09 Love Bites
programme.desc: A transgender woman in a wheelchair opens a can of whoop ass on an aggressive bully. Officers find a barely dressed couple in the midst of a biting match. A reckless driver doesn’t take too kindly to being pulled over.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E25 Scary Monsters
programme.desc: A resistant suspect thinks he sees monsters everywhere. Cops are forced to officiate a spousal wrestling match. Officers try to sort out where two motorists got their car and whose dope they possess.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S16 : E21 I Want Charges
programme.desc: An officer is attacked while attempting to break up a fight. Officers confiscate marijuana during a routine traffic stop. A man is arrested for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E08 An Unfortunate Cycle
programme.desc: Officers arrange a sting to capture bicycle thieves. An Officer conducts a traffic stop on a vehicle with fraudulent tags. An officer stops a vehicle after witnessing a prostitute get inside.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E29 Get a Room
programme.desc: A man claims to be protecting the car he breaks into. Officers respond when a couple gets too friendly while out in public. Police are dispatched when a drunk woman pounds on her neighbor’s door.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S19 : E04 You've Got Mail
programme.desc: During a routine traffice stop, an officer witnesses a cyclist get hit by a motorist. An officer investigates a domestic disturbance call involving some spousal infidelity. Authorities respond to a tip regarding a heavy weight drug dealer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E07 Auto Focus
programme.desc: A man with a knife tries to evade police by hiding in bushes. Vice Unit Officers conduct a prostitution sting. When Officers are shot at during a pursuit, the woman claims it was flashes from a camera.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E36 Visiting Hours Twofer
programme.desc: Police respond to a report of prostitution in a hospital parking lot. A man and woman engaged in solicitation are pulled over. A woman loitering in an area known for prostitution tries to evade police.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E09 Gimme a Break
programme.desc: Officers pursue two brothers after an attempted bank robbery. A confused man with a shotgun calls police after hearing voices. A man asks deputies for a break after they find illegal items in his truck.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S14 : E11 Naked Rental
programme.desc: Officers are called when a disturbed naked man covered in blood is spotted in a park. Officers find a nude couple in a U-Haul truck. A traffic stop over a minor violation turns into a dangerous pursuit.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E14 She Needed a Nap
programme.desc: Deputies pursue a man involved in a carjacking. Deputies are called to an altercation between a father and son. Officers respond to an unresponsive woman lying in a roadway.

programme.desc: Seventies music power to play loud! Work out your speakers with some pure power pop and rock including Pink Floyd, T.Rex, and Led Zepp!

programme.title: Who Won Wot in 1973?
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Who Won Wot in 1973?
programme.desc: Mark Goodier with 1973's big music award winners. What was Ebony magazine's 'Best Song', and who had the 'Biggest Selling Single' in both the UK & USA?

programme.title: All Day - It's 1973!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 All Day - It's 1973!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1973 & relive a year ablaze with excitement including groudbreaking music from Slade, Sweet, T.Rex & Elton John.

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1973
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1973
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of hits & headlines served with a side or order of flares! It was a busy year for the Queen as she opened the Sydney Opera House & the new London Bridge.

programme.title: Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1973
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mark Goodier's No.1s of 1973
programme.desc: 30 minutes of back to back number 1s from 1973 - including Suzi Quatro, Donny Osmond & The Sweet! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.

programme.title: All Day - It's 1973!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 All Day - It's 1973!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1973 & relive a year ablaze with excitement including groudbreaking music from Slade, Sweet, T.Rex & Elton John.

programme.title: Every Number 2 of 1973
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Every Number 2 of 1973
programme.desc: Runners-up from the UK charts in 1973 - those 11 songs that didn't quite make it, including Faces, T.Rex, David Bowie, Slade & Sweet. Yes there are some real classics coming up!

programme.title: All Day - It's 1973!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 All Day - It's 1973!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1973 & relive a year ablaze with excitement including groudbreaking music from Slade, Sweet, T.Rex & Elton John.

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1973
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The NOW Yearbook 1973
programme.desc: 1973 was another top year in music, as Glam Rock ruled, Paul McCartney did Bond & the UK had its biggest Christmas chart battle ever! Simon Bates has the story - month by month.

programme.title: All Day - It's 1973!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 All Day - It's 1973!
programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1973 & relive a year ablaze with excitement including groudbreaking music from Slade, Sweet, T.Rex & Elton John.

programme.title: American No.1s of 1973
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 American No.1s of 1973
programme.desc: In order - 14 videos that hit the top of the US chart in 1973. Some are obvious, but there are a few surprises along the way! Jim Croce anyone?

programme.desc: Experience the magic of 1973 & relive a year ablaze with excitement including groudbreaking music from Slade, Sweet, T.Rex & Elton John.

programme.title: The Best 1973 Party...Ever!

programme.title: 100% Superstars! 1970-1979
programme.desc: From Led Zep to Pink Floyd via Fleetwood Mac, Queen, Billy Joel, Carole King & Abba - these are the biggest music stars of the 70s. Period.

programme.title: Let's Rock!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Let's Rock!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock & power ballads!

programme.title: Rick Wakeman's WILD Things!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Rick Wakeman's WILD Things!
programme.desc: Remember when rock was WILD? From '64 to '74 the pioneering heroes presented by a man who was at the centre of it all - from The Kinks to The Beatles to Black Sabbath to Queen!

programme.title: Let's Rock!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Let's Rock!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock & power ballads!

programme.title: Seven Inch Heroes! 1970-1979
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Seven Inch Heroes! 1970-1979
programme.desc: 50 songs from the cooler end of the 70s spectrum - designed for repeated plays! From Free to The Police via Thin Lizzy, The Clash & Lene Lovich.

programme.title: The 5 O'Clock Groovy Zone!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The 5 O'Clock Groovy Zone!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: Limahl's Never Ending Soundtracks!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Limahl's Never Ending Soundtracks!
programme.desc: 2 decades of movie moments and classic pop hits from the 70s & 80s. Direct from the red carpet - Limahl is ready for his close-up!

programme.title: 70s School Disco!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 70s School Disco!
programme.desc: From the era of Glam Rock, New Wave & Disco - it's all the party hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.title: Never Even A Top 10?!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Never Even A Top 10?!
programme.desc: You'd think these 50 brilliant songs of the 70s from icons like The Police. Blondie, Elton John, Abba & more must have been huge - but they all missed the Top 10! Watch & weep.

programme.title: Help Me Make It Through the Night!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Help Me Make It Through the Night!
programme.desc: Non-stop love songs, back to back all night, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: Seven Inch Heroes! 1970-1979
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Seven Inch Heroes! 1970-1979
programme.desc: 50 songs from the cooler end of the 70s spectrum - designed for repeated plays! From Free to The Police via Thin Lizzy, The Clash & Lene Lovich.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The 5 O'Clock Groovy Zone!

programme.title: Limahl's Never Ending Soundtracks!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Limahl's Never Ending Soundtracks!
programme.desc: 2 decades of movie moments and classic pop hits from the 70s & 80s. Direct from the red carpet - Limahl is ready for his close-up!

programme.title: 20 Truckin' Good Tunes!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 20 Truckin' Good Tunes!
programme.desc: Switch on your CB radio, grab a bar of that chunky chocolate, and climb abroad for ninety minutes of top tunes for all you '70s truckers out there. Can I get a big 10-4, buddy?!

programme.title: Power Pop Day!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Power Pop Day!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock & power ballads - all day!

programme.title: Pat Sharp's Bad Hair - Big Tunes!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pat Sharp's Bad Hair - Big Tunes!
programme.desc: The hairvolution of rock'n'roll - the good, the bad, and the ugly. Pat Sharp is back with a countdown of classic 70s songs accompanied by dodgy 70s hair-don'ts!

programme.title: Power Pop Day!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Power Pop Day!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock & power ballads - all day!

programme.title: Fleetwood Mac! 1975-1989
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Fleetwood Mac! 1975-1989
programme.desc: Ignore the grainy visuals - just sit back and enjoy Fleetwood Mac in their late 70s & 80s pomp! 11 classic songs, in order, through Rumours, Tusk & Tango In The Night.

programme.title: Power Pop Day!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Power Pop Day!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock & power ballads - all day!

programme.title: John, Paul, George & Ringo!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 John, Paul, George & Ringo!
programme.desc: Following their 60s world domination, The Beatles went their separate ways with varying degrees of musical success! Here are some solo videos by the Fab Four from the 1970s & 80s.

programme.title: Killer Queen! 1974-1979
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Killer Queen! 1974-1979
programme.desc: Along with Abba, Elton John & Rod Stewart - Queen dominated the 70s and like them continue to resonate today! The songs are magnificent, and the videos are quite good too!

programme.title: Bam's Power Hours! 1970-1979
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bam's Power Hours! 1970-1979
programme.desc: A 10 hour pentathlon of power - a deafening decade of hits! 130 songs to turn up loud, presented by the only man who can - Bam!

programme.title: Dumplings, Steam Buns, and Dim Sum, Oh My!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, one brother will live like a king, while the other will check out the city’s street food scene.

programme.title: Simplicity vs. Splendor on the Seaside
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: The Lion's Share of Lyon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: Pancake Rocks: New Zealand

programme.desc: Tulip fields as seen from a drone perspective in the windmill-filled country of Holland.

programme.title: Breezy Beach: Dominican Republic

programme.title: Turquoise Waters: Philippines
programme.desc: Cliffs overlooking turquoise waters.

programme.title: Rainbow Reef Relaxation 2

programme.title: Dazzling Blue Lakeshore

programme.title: Atuh Beach: Indonesia
programme.desc: Take a tour of beautiful Indonesian waters, surrounded by impressive rock formations.

programme.title: Cabo Waves Crashing
programme.desc: The rugged yet relaxing sounds of powerful waves breaking on a secluded white-sandy beach in Cabo San Lucas.

programme.title: America From Above
programme.desc: Part one of a new series of ambient drone films for relaxation, America From Above is a spectacular yet ultra-soothing 1-hour long natural journey that sweeps viewers gently above America's vistas. You'll begin the farmlands of Iowa, soaring west through the Rocky Mountains of Colorado, then on to Utah's iconic red rock landscapes and finally ending on the West Coast with a familiar voyage over Big Sur and then back to San Diego just in time for sunset.

programme.title: Calming Mountain Waterfall
programme.desc: A fixed-angle one hour long nature scene of the beautiful Tangle Falls in Jasper National Park, paired with real stereo nature sounds shot on location; although it's a static video, there are a lot of dynamic elements.

programme.title: Tropical Weightlessness
programme.desc: Gently sway in the tropical turquoise waters with a glimpse of blue sky and palm trees.

programme.title: Glacial Beauty: Newfoundland
programme.desc: Admiring the quiet and glacial beauty of icebergs drifting across the bay at Newfoundland's Amherst Cove.

programme.title: Lush Vineyards: Portugal
programme.desc: The jaw-droppingly beautiful Douro Valley, Portugal's most scenic wine regions.

programme.title: Return to Paradise 1
programme.desc: Featuring the hidden exotic Fijian island of Nanuku, a tiny, palm-covered, sandy atoll surrounded by lagoons brimming with sea life; some aerial drone clips give perspective from above.

programme.title: Santa Ynez Valley: California
programme.desc: Santa Ynez Valley: California

programme.title: Hidden Tropical Paradise 1
programme.desc: Distant wave breaks, trees and birds, and passing clouds in the remote north-eastern islands of Fiji.

programme.title: Hollyford Track: New Zealand
programme.desc: A remote beech forest full of diverse vegetation, waterfalls and rocky streams.

programme.title: Inambakan Falls: Philippines
programme.desc: Scenes of cascading falls and a pool reminiscent of blue gems, then a glimpse of the surrounding jungle greens.

programme.title: Bayahibe Pier: Dominican Republic
programme.desc: Taking a break on the idyllic Bayahibe Pier in the Dominican Republic to enjoy its hushed seaside and turquoise waters.

programme.title: Playa Fronton: Dominican Republic
programme.desc: The sand lies just beneath the soft lapping of waves on a Dominican tropical beach.

programme.title: Tumalog & Aguinid Falls: Philippines

programme.title: Gentle Creek: British-Columbia
programme.desc: Admire the twin summits, lush valley, and sparkling creek of Golden Ears Provincial Park in British-Columbia.

programme.title: Nature's Beauty: World of Relaxation
programme.desc: A seamless mix of several Nature Relaxation's shorter length productions.

programme.title: Peaceful Farms: New Zealand
programme.desc: Calming music with animals quietly grazing the lush landscape.

programme.title: Fly Over Earth
programme.desc: Footage of scenic destinations.

programme.title: Auckland Beaches: New Zealand

programme.title: Wairere Falls: New Zealand
programme.desc: The Wairere Falls of New Zealand.

programme.title: Shark Paradise
programme.desc: Captured by filmmaker collaborator Peter Schneider, Shark Paradise features hundreds of unique real-time scenes captured from around the world, paired with gentle underwater sounds and calming music for deep relaxation by Relax Moods.

programme.title: Gisborne & Lake Twizel: New Zealand
programme.desc: Taking in Gisborne's tranquil cliff-lined coastlines, driftwood, and rushing waves; going lakeside in the Twizel region to explore snow-covered mountain ranges and the calm surface of the lake waters.

programme.title: Autumn in Amsterdam
programme.desc: A cityscape film captured by collaborating cinematographer and dutch resident Nick DeJonge.

programme.title: Cliffside Beach: Indonesia
programme.desc: The thrilling view of a cliff-top lookout of one of Indonesia's most breathtaking spots.

programme.title: Autumn from Above
programme.desc: Basking in the glow of the fiery colors of fall, from above.

programme.title: Glistening Island Beach
programme.desc: A big palm tree facing a white sandy beach, glistening blue sea, sunshine, and a small boat; filmed in 4K Ultra High Definition on the hidden island of Nanuku, where a small atoll is surrounded by an untouched lagoon, miles away from it all.

programme.title: Rainbow Reef Relaxation 1
programme.desc: Vibrant underwater reefs, including many scenes which no longer look as depicted due to coral bleaching.

programme.title: Mount Cook: New Zealand
programme.desc: Taking in the rugged beauty of snow-capped mountains and calm emerald waters.

programme.title: Lombok Beaches: Indonesia
programme.desc: Experiencing the beaches of an Indonesian island set to a peaceful soundtrack.

programme.title: Tiga Warna Beach: Indonesia
programme.desc: Exploring the many faces of a breathtaking beach in Indonesia.

programme.title: Soothing Stream: Quebec
programme.desc: This morning, autumn shines its magical, golden light on the rushing waters of the Parc national de la Jacques-Cartier.

programme.title: Healing Hawaii II: Oahu
programme.desc: The wonders of Oahu.

programme.title: Journey Around the World
programme.desc: There is no better way to relax and unwind than traveling to the world's most breathtaking and remote locations.

programme.title: Kabut Pelangi Waterfall: Indonesia
programme.desc: Traveling to East Java and experiencing a waterfall tucked deep in the lush forest.

programme.title: Railey Peninsula
programme.desc: The Thailand islands of the Railey Peninsula; the exotic beaches and islands appear as if they came bursting out of the sea; paired with ocean sounds for total relaxation.

programme.title: Relaxing Tide: Dominican Republic
programme.desc: Relaxing in a Caribbean paradise by the lighthouse on the Dominican Republic's Bayahibe Beach.

programme.title: Waimamaku Beach: New Zealand
programme.desc: Exploring the remote, cliff-lined, cavernous coastline of Waimamaku Beach.

programme.title: Fall in the Forest
programme.desc: Sweeping yellow autumn mountain scenes.

programme.title: Island of Maui, Hawaii, U.S.
programme.desc: The beauty and exotic charm of the Lahaina marina located on the Hawaiian island of Maui.

programme.title: Playa Fronton: Dominican Republic
programme.desc: The sand lies just beneath the soft lapping of waves on a Dominican tropical beach.

programme.title: Flying Over the Atlantic Ocean
programme.desc: Travelling the coasts of the Atlantic Ocean from a bird's-eye view.

programme.title: Dazzling Blue Lakeshore
programme.desc: Relaxing on the blue shoreline of New Zealand's famous Lake Pukaki; filmed in January 2017 on New Zealand's South Island.

programme.title: Beach Paradise: East Bali
programme.desc: A serene soundtrack amidst a journey to spectacular beaches in Bali.

programme.title: Wildlife Wonders of South America
programme.desc: A sunrise at Salar de Uyuni in Bolivia with flamingo and llama scenes from high altitude volcanic salt lakes; welcoming new life in the Chilean landscapes of San Pedro Atacama; the Torres del Paine National Park in Patagonia.

programme.title: Dolphin Voyage Relaxation
programme.desc: Underwater cinematography, a synergistic blend of audio including underwater nature sounds, and calming ambient music combine to induce relaxtion in the deep blue calming ocean with a pod of friendly dolphins.

programme.title: Cunningham Cabin; Grand Teton National Park
programme.desc: Getting lost in the golden pastures of Grand Teton National Park.

programme.title: Beach Paradise: Hawaii
programme.desc: Spending a restful moment in Maui, a tropical paradise of gleaming white sand beaches and turquoise waters.

programme.title: Crashing Waves: Hawaii
programme.desc: The energizing sound of waves crashing on the shores of Hawaii's Red Sand Beach.

programme.title: Earth From Above
programme.desc: Traveling the world with a birds-eye-view perspective of scenic wonders.

programme.title: Haast Falls: New Zealand
programme.desc: Haast Pass, the peak home to these roaring falls of melted glacial waters. Mysteriously misty forests, gorgeous nature trails, and local wildlife.

programme.title: Shark Paradise
programme.desc: Captured by filmmaker collaborator Peter Schneider, Shark Paradise features hundreds of unique real-time scenes captured from around the world, paired with gentle underwater sounds and calming music for deep relaxation by Relax Moods.

programme.title: Relaxing Nature Sceneries
programme.desc: The filmmaker provides a collection of peaceful nature scenes and tranquil vistas that will soothe body and soul.

programme.title: Peaceful Forest Walk: Quebec
programme.desc: The heart of the Laurentians.

programme.title: Tropical Bay: Dominican Republic
programme.desc: Exploring an iridescent blue bay on the Dominican Republic's Playa Rincon's.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Mukteshwar, India
programme.desc: Amidst a canopy of conifer forests and orchards, Mukteshwar sits in the lap of the Himalayas. Healer and Rohan soak in the quiet, pastoral quaintness of the region as they camp under the stars at this mountain village. They also visit Peora, a serene hamlet defined by its orchards, which has come to be known as the fruit bowl of Uttarakhand.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Viajar Peru Huascaran
programme.desc: In the rugged heart of the Peruvian Andes, Milagros sets out on an exhilarating adventure in Huascaran National Park.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Backpack Belgrade, Serbia
programme.desc: Visit Belgrade, with Heather as she explores the city, its architecture and learns about its past by visiting historical monuments.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xplore Ireland Dublin
programme.desc: Which is the UNESCO City of Literature? Here's a clue - it's also the treasure trove of Guinness! Taste the merriment in Dublin.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Off The Grid Tsomoriri, India
programme.desc: Alexandra starts her journey from Tsomoriri where on the way she stops at Baralacha Pass. Later she visits Korzok village, interacts with locals and dresses up in a traditional Ladakhi attire.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Nagthat, India
programme.desc: Uttarakhand, a state in northern India crossed by the Himalayas, is known for its Hindu pilgrimage sites. However, Rohan goes there with his travel buddy, Healer, looking for adventures. Their first stop is a small, mountain village, Nagthat, where the locals give them a unique welcome. As they set out to explore the surroundings, they chance upon a beautiful waterfall.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Viajar Peru Lima
programme.desc: Dramatic views of the Pacific Ocean, brightly colored colonial buildings, world-class cuisine – the capital city of Peru, Lima has a lot going for it. Milagros reveals the treasures of her home city from the diverse neighborhoods, like the upscale Miraflores to the bohemian Barranco. She also shows a side of Lima where one can enjoy fun adventures with the marine creatures.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Ireland Galway
programme.desc: Driving along the world's longest defined coastal route has a lot of surprises in store. Right from the arty Galway city to the wilderness in Burren.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Off The Grid Leh. India
programme.desc: Alexandra explores the rugged region of Leh, visiting Thiksey Monastery, Leh Palace and Shanti Stupa. Later she sets out for a five hour drive to the picturesque Pangong Lake and stays in the tent.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Nag Tibba, India
programme.desc: Situated on the foothills of Uttarakhand’s Garhwal mountains, Nag Tibba is a popular trekking destination. At an altitude of 3100 meters above sea level, this mountain peak is believed to be the abode of the god of serpents. As Healer and Rohan embark on this trek, they pass local villages and forests, and catch breathtaking views of the Himalayas along the way.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Viajar Peru Trujillo
programme.desc: In the last leg of her journey, Milagros goes to Trujillo, where she introduces the flavors of the northern region of Peru and also Marinera – the sensuous national dance. But the highlight in Trujillo are the forgotten sites like Chan Chan and Huaca del Moche, where secrets from Peru’s pre-Incan past begin to unfold.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 Backpack Pozarevac, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Ireland Wild Atlantic Way
programme.desc: Relive the glories of Irish aristocracy as if no time has gone by, in the castles of Ireland. Relish the quaintness of laidback Irish towns.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Off The Grid Nubra valley, India
programme.desc: A 106 feet Buddha statue mesmerizes Alex as she explores Diskit Monastery in Nubra Valley. She tries the traditional ladakhi food and explores Leh city, by visiting Gurdwara Pathar Sahib and a school.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Kanatal, India
programme.desc: On a trip to explore the lesser-known sides of Uttarakhand, Rohan and Healer find themselves at Kanatal, a rustic hill retreat. Rohan attempts to get Healer off his fear of water by taking him on a boat ride on the waters of Asia’s biggest man-made lake. Later on, they meet some locals, who introduce them to Garhwali folk music.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Food Fact Fun Taipei City, Taiwan
programme.desc: In Taipei, Alex visits major attractions such as Modern Toilet Restaurant, Chiang Kai Shek memorial hall, Longshan Temple and Taipei 101.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 City Breaks Sofia, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria's capital Sofia is one of Europe's most compact and walkable city, with small gardens, parks and cafes sprawled all over.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E29 Backpack Majdanpek, Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Xplore Ireland Belfast
programme.desc: Lose yourself amidst the spectacular landscapes of Northern Ireland. Witness the miraculous resurfacing of Belfast.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Off The Grid Kargil, India
programme.desc: Alexandra explores Kargil, where she is invited for breakfast by the owner of a resort where she is putting up and understands the influence of the cultures on the locals.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Rishikesh, India
programme.desc: The sacred city of Rishikesh is a haven for pilgrims, yogis and adventure lovers from all around the world. Healer and Rohan experience the thrill of river rafting on the spirited rapids of the holy river Ganga. After this adrenaline rush, they visit a quiet beach to cool off but are surprised and amused to see it filled with couples on pre wedding shoots.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Food Fact Fun Taichung, Taiwan
programme.desc: Alex experiences offbeat attractions such as Wuwei Tea House, 921 Museum, Miyahara dessert parlour, National Taichung Theater, Rainbow village and Sun Cake Museum.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 City Breaks Valencia, Spain
programme.desc: Valencia, the birthplace of paella, has got the bones of a metropolis and the heart of a quaint seaside town. Alex Outhwaite experiences this when she visits the strikingly futuristic City Of Arts And Sciences and then tries the local specialty, Pinxtos at a Tapas Bar and enjoys Valencia’s laidback charms at El Cabanyal Beach. She also encounters the city’s strong Catholic roots at Cathedral de Valencia, the alleged home of the Holy Grail used by Christ at the Last Supper.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E30 Backpack Nis, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Off The Grid Suru Valley, India
programme.desc: Alex explores Munshi Aziz Bhat Museum displaying the lives of the people, influenced by the traders and travels further on the way to Srinagar. She admires the beauty of Mt. Kun and Nun Kun glacier.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Jim Corbett, India
programme.desc: Healer is upset with Rohan as he leaves him behind and goes in search of the big cats of the jungle. Rohan meets up with some villagers who stay at the edge of the tiger reserve and discusses the human-animal conflicts faced by them. At the Corbett Museum, he discovers some interesting facets of the man after whom the park was named.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Food Fact Fun Tainan, Taiwan
programme.desc: In Tainan, Alex tries local delicacies, visits Sun Moon Lake, Taiwanese Aboriginal Culture Village, Yanshui Catholic church, Ten Drum creative park and goes paragliding.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Off The Grid Zanskar, India
programme.desc: On reaching Zanskar, Alex visits Karsha Monastery, the largest one in Zanskar. She ends her stay after exploring the Sani Kanika Monastery, built in 17th century and the stupa.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Heritage Agra( Eng)
programme.desc: Travel back in time, explore the monuments and learn about the architecture built by the Mughals in Agra and Fatehpur Sikri.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Jilling Terraces, India
programme.desc: The lesser-visited Kumaon region of Uttarakhand is largely unspoiled, and boasts pleasant small towns with panoramic mountain views. In one of these small towns, Rohan sets out to take in these panoramic mountain views through paragliding. Will Healer, his partner-in-crime, be satisfied sitting on the sidelines? Or will the two of them together sail fearlessly across the skies?

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 World Spas Movenpick, Jordan
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries many different spa treatments, which leave her skin glowing, at the Movenpick Resort in Jordan.

programme.desc: In Tainan, Alex tries local delicacies, visits Sun Moon Lake, Taiwanese Aboriginal Culture Village, Yanshui Catholic church, Ten Drum creative park and goes paragliding.

programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Jilling Terraces, India
programme.desc: The lesser-visited Kumaon region of Uttarakhand is largely unspoiled, and boasts pleasant small towns with panoramic mountain views. In one of these small towns, Rohan sets out to take in these panoramic mountain views through paragliding. Will Healer, his partner-in-crime, be satisfied sitting on the sidelines? Or will the two of them together sail fearlessly across the skies?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 Food Fact Fun Yilan, Taiwan
programme.desc: Alex explores Yilan starting from Xing-Yuan tea farm, then visits Farmers’ Market, tries a duck delicacy. Further he visits a Museum, a Whiskey Distillery, National Centre for Traditional Arts, enjoys a high speed train ride and treks up to experience the beauty of a waterfall.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Off The Grid Srinagar, India
programme.desc: Alex is in Srinagar putting up on a houseboat. She explores the Dal lake, tries Kashmiri Tea, and ends her day with a traditional Kashmiri platter – Wazwan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 World Heritage Pattadakal, India
programme.desc: Listen to the tales of Pattadakal temples, built by Kings, claiming their legitimacy from Gods and hear the echoes of the legacy of sun-worshippers.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E32 Backpack Sjenica, Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: Travel Diaries of Healer & Rohan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Travel Diaries Of Healer & Rohan Mukteshwar, India
programme.desc: Amidst a canopy of conifer forests and orchards, Mukteshwar sits in the lap of the Himalayas. Healer and Rohan soak in the quiet, pastoral quaintness of the region as they camp under the stars at this mountain village. They also visit Peora, a serene hamlet defined by its orchards, which has come to be known as the fruit bowl of Uttarakhand.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 World Spas Mines Wellness, Thailand (ENG)
programme.desc: Shirodhara is a traditional Ayurvedic oil drip treatment that popular world traveler, Jamie Srubis tries at the Mines Wellness Resort in Malaysia. Following this, she tries other treatments such as Urut Melayu, a full body massage which derives its technique from a traditional Malay martial art, and Acupuncture and Moxibustion, the two oldest treatments of Traditional Chinese Medicine.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 10 Days Scotland Perth (ENG)
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 City Breaks Ahmedabad (ENG)
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 10 Days Scotland Aberdeen (ENG)
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 Backpack Pozarevac, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Bulgaria Sofia
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 10 Days Scotland Aberdeenshire (ENG)
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E29 Backpack Majdanpek, Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xplore Bhutan Paro
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 10 Days Scotland Inverness (ENG)
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E30 Backpack Nis, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bhutan Thimpu
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Bhutan Phobjikha
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E32 Backpack Sjenica, Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 10 Days Scotland Edinburgh (ENG)
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Xplore Bulgaria Plovdiv
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E29 XP Guide, Stockholm
programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: Whether it is the Jaguar F-Type, the Aston Martin V8 Vantage or the Bentley Continental, English convertibles are elegant and exclusive.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: Open sportscars from Ferrari, Alfa Romeo, Maserati, and Lamborghini are stunning.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: They are the dream cars for high passion and the individual desire for driver: international luxury cabriolets from Rolls Royce, Bentley, Mercedes, Porsche and Maserati. They are the most exclusive cars in the world and offer more style.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: They are the most spectacular convertibles in the world and the most fascinating of all automobiles. Open two-seater sports cars built for velocities exceeding 300 km/h, built for an unparalleled driving pleasure.

programme.title: BMW 503
programme.desc: The noble four-seater 503 convertible was one of BMWs most exclusive models in the 1950s; many international sports and movie stars and other wealthy customers were fond of this sporty luxury vehicle.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Track Masters
programme.desc: The Nuerburgring. where motor fans really let your hair down on a spectacular and difficult race track and learn how to get fit for Motor Sports. That is why Motor Fans come here to the Nuerburgring throughout the year.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Track Masters
programme.desc: Entertaining clips from the Nuerburgring. Expect to see the pedal on the metal and rubber burning up the place.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Track Masters
programme.desc: After the snow and ice clears on the Nuerburgring, the horsepower junkies return to the ring to tear it up once again.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Filming a car crash for a big movie.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Insight into the world of film stunts.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: To every stunt belongs a little movie. The Stunt Heroes always kept it like that! In the second season the stuntteam created again 13 action-film sequences - sometimes funny, sometimes brutal, sometimes evil - but always spectacular.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Despite their compact size, the Volkswagen Polo GTI and Citroen DS4 pack quite a punch.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Every day people in the city fight for the last parking spaces. More and more cars are being bought and they are getting bigger and wider.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 Perfect Ride
programme.desc: A city car and a super sports car with the same drive concept? Exactly. The Porsche GT3 and Smart both have rear-wheel drive.

programme.title: The Dubai Police Force's Special Cars Unit
programme.desc: For the first time, the Dubai Police special cars unit allows a TV crew to accompany their officers on patrol; these aren't normal police cars because this is not a normal city.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Kati and Patrick from Munich are huge fanas of US cars and proud owners of a 1972 Chevrolet Chevelle. But they are no longer satisfied with its 5.7-liter small block and want to buy a bigger engine.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 MotorStories
programme.desc: Paaren / Glien near Berlin is host to the yearly Oldtimer Show. It attracts around 45,000 visitors, who are able to gaze at more than 5000 automobile treasures. Frank and his crew from Special Cars Berlin attend the event.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 MotorStories
programme.desc: With more than 500 supercars from Lamborghini, Ferrari or expensive brands like Bugatti and Koenigsegg, Germany is home to the world's largest Supercars Rallye. Participants can look forward to action-packed stages.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Station wagons remain practical vehicles with a lot of space. The Skoda Octavia Scout and the Opel Insignia Country Tourer want to be more than that. A bigger ground clearance, hub caps, underride guard, and a body side.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: A look at some of the most extreme specimens in the offroad world: a Fiat Panda monster truck, a Ford Raptor, a Mercedes G-Class conversion, a modified Volkswagen Touareg, a Jeep Grand Cherokee SRT8 and the Fiat Panda Cross.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Asian car design has evolved over the last years. At Lexus, the luxury vehicle division of Toyota, the current trend is toward angular shapes and aggressive appearance.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Same platform, but three different models: The Skoda Kodiaq provides room for seven people and scores with a favorable entry-level price. The Volkswagen Tiguan is a bit more expensive, but offers a broader range of engines and more technical gadgets.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The Jaguar XF-S is supposed to put pressure on BMW, Audi and co. in the business class segment. With V6 power, 380 HP output and all-wheel drive it wants to teach the German top dogs the true meaning of the word fear.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: By selling and assembling accessories for Jeep, ORZ Vehicles makes the American off-road dream come true for European customers.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: SUVs are still popular and the segment grows steadily. Especially smaller SUVs enter the market. They are perfect for the city, off-road capabilities are less important.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The history of car advertising .

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The history of the car advertisement.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The history of the car advertisement.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The 60-year history of the Chevrolet Corvette gives insight into what makes it a present-day global bestseller and symbol of the American driving experience.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: 50 years Porsche 911, and 60 years Chevrolet Corvette. Two legends, two dreamcars each with two opponents philosophies.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The Indy 500 is one of the world's most spectacular motor races in the world. Watched by a huge number of people, this motorsports event doesn't fail to impress at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The German Rally Championship has been running since 1970. At the 1983 race, the sporty models from Opel saw exceptional success.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: With the introduction of the Group D-Monsters in the World Rally Championships, the fight for the title got harder and harder. That's why Audi brought a strong trump onto the road in 1985 - The Sport Quattro.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: In 1954, Mercedes returns to the Grand Prix circuit after 20 years of abstinence.

programme.title: Historic Formula V
programme.desc: In the late 1950s in America, the first Formula V racers were produced. These small cars were seen on tracks until the end of the 1970s, but their heritage would live on through an association known as Historic Formula V Europe.

programme.desc: A look at some of the most extreme specimens in the offroad world: a Fiat Panda monster truck, a Ford Raptor, a Mercedes G-Class conversion, a modified Volkswagen Touareg, a Jeep Grand Cherokee SRT8 and the Fiat Panda Cross.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Asian car design has evolved over the last years. At Lexus, the luxury vehicle division of Toyota, the current trend is toward angular shapes and aggressive appearance.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Same platform, but three different models: The Skoda Kodiaq provides room for seven people and scores with a favorable entry-level price. The Volkswagen Tiguan is a bit more expensive, but offers a broader range of engines and more technical gadgets.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: The Jaguar XF-S is supposed to put pressure on BMW, Audi and co. in the business class segment. With V6 power, 380 HP output and all-wheel drive it wants to teach the German top dogs the true meaning of the word fear.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: By selling and assembling accessories for Jeep, ORZ Vehicles makes the American off-road dream come true for European customers.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: SUVs are still popular and the segment grows steadily. Especially smaller SUVs enter the market. They are perfect for the city, off-road capabilities are less important.

programme.desc: Ralph R. Debbas had the dream to build ultimate supercar and first one developed in Arabic world.

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: The Dubai Police Force's Special Cars Unit

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: BMW M3 and Mercedes C63 AMG. The top models battle it out forever. While the C63 has better performance values on paper, the M3 has always been delivering the better performance. It's a never ending back and forth.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Aston Martin Vanquish has a roaring V12 engine that outputs 576 hp and an ability to go: from 0 to 100 in 3.8 seconds. Its top speed: 323 km/h.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Lamborghini Huracan is brutal. Its V10 naturally aspirated engine produces 610 hp and catapults the Italian fighting bull from 0 to 100 km/h in 3.1 seconds. But some people think that that's not enough power.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Around the world, the Mercedes S-Class is considered to be one of the most elegant and luxurious limousines. Now the S-Class treads new paths and presents itself topless for the very first time.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The bigger, the better. This subject is, however, disputed, especially when it comes to rear-wings. But anybody who sees a car with a big rear-wing knows: There is mighty power under the hood - and it needs to be harnessed.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Car History
programme.desc: The Volkswagen Beetle is not just a car. For many people it's THE car. Built over 22 million times, it has conquered every continent of the world. Being 60 years old, it tells us more about our century than many history books.
